title: Flexible load transport and large cargo area
description: Carry whatever cargo you need to on a loading surface 75 cm long and with a maximum width of 54 cm: camping equipment, the weekly shop, young children or a delivery to your business customers. Nothing disrupts your safe and agile riding experience, as the Cargo Bike can handle almost all needs, thanks to its low centre of gravity, its many individual equipment options and refined Control Technology. For greater freedom and flexibility â€“ whatever your plans. (Loading surface approved for up to max. 70 kg.)
subtitle: Maximum freedom of transport.
